content.description: In sentence 3 (reproduced below), the writer wants to provide relevant information about ornithology to help those who are unfamiliar with it.
content.question: But before James Bond was the name of a famous fictional spy, it was the name of a real person: an ornithologist (a scientist who studies birds) whose guidebook Birds of the West Indies was a standard reference work for bird-watchers in the Caribbean.Which of the following versions of the underlined text most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: a member of a group that also included Charles Darwin
skilled in both field research and museum studies
who, like many ornithologists, advocated for conservation of natural habitats
